analysis.description:
Reentrancy in WolkExchange.purchaseWolk (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#355-368):
	External calls:
	- wolkReceivable = purchaseWolkEstimate(msg.value,exchangeFormula) (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#357-359)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#359-363)
	- reserveBalance (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#364)

Reentrancy in WolkExchange.sellWolk (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#338-351):
	External calls:
	- ethReceivable = sellWolkEstimate(_wolkAmount,exchangeFormula) (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#340-341)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#342-343)
	- contributorTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#343-347)
	- reserveBalance (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#348)

WolkExchange.fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.purchaseWolk.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol)

Reentrancy in WolkExchange.setExchangeFormula (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#281-291):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(sellWolkEstimate(10 ** decimals,_newExchangeformula) > 0) (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#284-289)
	- require(bool)(purchaseWolkEstimate(10 ** decimals,_newExchangeformula) > 0) (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#289)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- isPurchasePossible (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#290)
	- isSellPossible (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#290)

	External calls:
	- require(bool)(sellWolkEstimate(10 ** decimals,exchangeFormula) > 0) (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#320-321)
	- require(bool)(purchaseWolkEstimate(10 ** decimals,exchangeFormula) > 0) (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#321)

WolkTGE.tokenGenerationEvent (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#207-233) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((whitelistContributor[_participant] || whitelistContributor[msg.sender] || balances[_participant] > 0 || kycRequirement) && ! allSaleCompleted && (block.timestamp <= end_time) && msg.value > 0) (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#207-211)

elements.expression: require(bool)((whitelistContributor[_participant] || whitelistContributor[msg.sender] || balances[_participant] > 0 || kycRequirement) && ! allSaleCompleted && (block.timestamp <= end_time) && msg.value > 0)

analysis.description:
WolkTGE.refund (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#247-261) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((contribution[msg.sender] > 0) && (! allSaleCompleted) && (block.timestamp > end_time) && (totalTokens < tokenGenerationMin)) (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol#247-251)

WolkExchange.fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= end_time (/unique_chucks/5/0xf6b55acbbc49f4524aa48d19281a9a77c54de10f.sol)
